import{useEffect,useState,useLayoutEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FacebookPagePlugin=()=>{const[isMobile,setIsMobile]=useState(false);// Detecter la taille de l'écran
useLayoutEffect(()=>{const updateSize=()=>{setIsMobile(window.innerWidth<=768);};updateSize();window.addEventListener('resize',updateSize);return()=>window.removeEventListener('resize',updateSize);},[]);useEffect(()=>{if(!document.getElementById('facebook-jssdk')){const script=document.createElement('script');script.id='facebook-jssdk';script.src='https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js#xfbml=1&version=v19.0';script.async=true;script.defer=true;document.body.appendChild(script);}else{window.FB&&window.FB.XFBML.parse();}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexDirection:isMobile?'column':'row',maxWidth:'1000px',margin:'1.5rem auto',borderRadius:'16px',overflow:'hidden',boxShadow:'0 8px 24px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)',backgroundColor:'#f9f9f9',padding:isMobile?'1rem':'0'},children:[!isMobile&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{backgroundColor:'#4267B2',color:'white',padding:'5rem',display:'flex',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center',writingMode:'vertical-rl',textOrientation:'mixed',fontSize:'1.4rem',fontWeight:'bold',letterSpacing:'2px',minWidth:'60px'},children:"Facebook"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{flex:1,padding:isMobile?'0':'2rem',width:'100%'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{textAlign:'center',marginBottom:isMobile?'1rem':'1rem',fontSize:isMobile?'1.4rem':'1.6rem',color:'#333'},children:"Suivez notre page Facebook"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'center'},className:"fb-page","data-href":"https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61568953924546&locale=fr_FR","data-tabs":"timeline","data-width":isMobile?"320":"700","data-height":isMobile?"400":"600","data-small-header":"false","data-adapt-container-width":"false","data-hide-cover":"false","data-show-facepile":"true"})]})]});};export default FacebookPagePlugin;
